src:
Nicolas Cage v traileru sci-fi Color Out of Space
Podívejte se na trailer sci-fi filmu Color Out of Space s Nicolasem Cagem.
07 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Václav Limberk



Fotografie z filmu Color Out of Space



Nicolas Cage a Joely Richardson ve filmu Color Out of Space


Sci-fi Color Out of Space natočil Richard Stanley podle povídky H.P. Lovecrafta. Meteorit dopadne blízko farmy pětičlenné rodiny, která postupně začne ztrácet rozum. Ve filmu Color Out of Space hrají Nicolas Cage a Joely Richardson. Premiéru bude mít 24. ledna 2020.Trailer zhlédněte níže.


Originální trailer filmu Color Out of Space
text:
Nicolas Cage on the sci-fi trailer Color Out of Space
Watch the trailer of the sci-fi movie Color Out of Space with Nicolas Cage.
07 Nov 2019, 10:30 by Václav Limberk



Photos from the movie Color Out of Space



Nicolas Cage and Joely Richardson in Color Out of Space


The science fiction Color Out of Space was filmed by Richard Stanley based on a short story by H.P. Lovecrafta. The meteorite lands near the farm of a family of five, which gradually loses its mind. In the movie Color Out of Space starring Nicolas Cage and Joely Richardson. It will be premiered on January 24, 2020. See the trailer below.


The original trailer of the movie Color Out of Space
